item.title: I need an honest answer to this one
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

First Off. Porn itself can be very bad when it gets to the point of addiction. Studies have shown that addicts to porn are 43% more likely to be sexual offenders later in life. It also has been shown that many men who start looking at porn when young continue into their adult life ruining many relationships because the woman believes that she is enough and she ends up feeling hurt by his pornography addiction.
How to solve it:
Just tell yourself that you want more in life then to be controlled by the impulse of porn.
Next just leave the room that your computer is in when you get that urge and just go jog or go downstairs and do something to keep your mind off of it. All it takes is to say no once and you’ll feel great that you aren’t controlled by porno. Just my two cents.

Read full topic
